text_raw:

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving further effect
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended in Regulation 2 by inserting after
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended in Regulation 2 by inserting after 

paragraph (1) the following paragraph: 

“(1A) These Regulations also apply to the identification and registration of 
poultry, eggs and poultry hatcheries.”. 

Amendment of Regulation 3

Article 4(9) of Regulation 2016/429 and where the context so 
requires or admits, a reference to eggs of poultry;”.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving further effect
heading: 6. The Principal Regulations are amended in Regulation 6–
text_raw:
6. The Principal Regulations are amended in Regulation 6– 

(a) 

in paragraph (1) by substituting “A person” for “An operator”, 

(b) by inserting the following paragraph after paragraph (2): 

“(2A) Where the application for registration referred to in 
paragraph (1) relates to the register of germinal product 
establishments, the applicant shall, in addition to the requirements 
already mentioned in this Regulation, provide evidence of the 
requirements referred to in Article 6 of Regulation 2020/686.”, 
and 

(c) 

in paragraph (3), by inserting after “terrestrial animals” the 
following: “or collecting, producing, processing or storing 
germinal products”.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving further effect
heading: 10. The Principal Regulations are amended by inserting the following
text_raw:
10. The Principal Regulations are amended by inserting the following 

Regulation after Regulation 14: 

“Identification, kept terrestrial animal other than an animal of the 
bovine, ovine, caprine, porcine or equine species 

14A. (1) A person shall not contravene Article 117 of Regulation 
2016/429 or an act referred to in Articles 118, 119 or 120, in respect of 
the identification of poultry. 

(2) Without prejudice to the generality of paragraph (1), a person shall 
not contravene Title VI of Part III of Regulation 2019/2035 in respect 
of the obligations on operators as regards the traceability of hatching 
eggs.” 

Amendment of Regulation 33

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving further effect
heading: (1) The European Communities (Poultry and Hatching Eggs)
text_raw:
13. 

(1) The European Communities (Poultry and Hatching Eggs) 

Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 564 of 2010) are revoked. 

(2) Where a transitional measure mentioned in Regulation 2016/429 or in an 
act referred to in that Regulation is applicable and such transitional measure 
requires the continuation of a provision revoked by paragraph (1) the relevant 
provision of the Regulations revoked by paragraph (1) shall continue to apply as 
if that provision had not been revoked for so long as the transitional measure 
permits. 

(3) An application for a registration or approval (within the meaning of the 
Regulations revoked by paragraph (1) that remains to be determined on 
commencement of these Regulations is, after the commencement of these 
Regulations, considered to be an application for a registration or approval under 
the equivalent provision of the Principal Regulations and may be determined as 
if made under the Principal Regulations. 

(4) A registration or approval granted under the Regulations revoked by 
paragraph (1) and in force immediately before the making of these Regulations 
continues in force after such making as if granted under the Principal 
Regulations. 

(5) Any reference made in an instrument to Regulations revoked by 
paragraph (1) shall be construed as a reference to the Principal Regulations, or 
where the context so requires or admits, a reference to the European Union 
(Marketing Standards for Poultry and Hatching Eggs) Regulations 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [306] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 June, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [306] 7

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving further effect
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to EU legislation on the identification and 
registration of poultry, eggs and hatcheries.
